media:group.media:title: Spanish Classroom Commands- Tú Commands
media:group.media:description:
Learn common classroom commands so that you can understand your teacher's requests like our friends do in this video! This video demonstrates the usage of tú commands, the form used when speaking directly to one person informally.

TPRS (Teaching Proficiency through Reading and Storytelling) has been proven to be an effective and engaging way to learn a new language. If you enjoy this approach to language acquisition, subscribe to my channel for more TPRS and Comprehensible Input videos!
